main event: An unidentified flying object was reported hovering and displaying zig-zag motion in Paterson, New Jersey.
interesting points: The object hovered and pulsated for about 2 minutes before accelerating suddenly., The estimated size of the object was about 10 to 15 feet in diameter., There were no apparent means of propulsion visible on the object., Observers described its maneuvers as tilting and rolling with lights turning on and off., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes before the object blinked out.
witness description: 10 observers reported the sighting, including a detailed witness who described its appearance and behavior.
